extends com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglApplicationConfiguration

      • pauseWhenBackground

        public boolean pauseWhenBackground
        Pause (but continue rendering) when the game window is not minimized and not the foreground window. To stop rendering when not the foreground window, use backgroundFPS -1.
